summary: Defines the ONNX export configuration for the BigBirdPegasus model, providing utilities to flatten past key/value tensors and generate appropriate dummy inputs for various tasks (causal LM, seq2seq LM, classification, QA) as well as exposing the model's input and output specifications.
business_intent: Enable seamless conversion and deployment of the BigBirdPegasus transformer model to ONNX format for efficient inference across multiple NLP tasks.
